deepseek_optimized_prompt: "Professional product photo of sleek, modern black rectangular sunglasses with a dark tint, positioned at a slight angle to showcase the frame shape and lens gradient. The sunglasses should be placed on a clean, reflective acrylic surface to create a high-end look, with soft, diffused lighting to highlight the matte black frame and subtle reflections on the lenses. The background should be a minimalist, neutral-toned gradient (light gray to soft white) to emphasize the product without distractions. The mood should be sophisticated and contemporary, with cool undertones to match the modern brand style. Include subtle shadows for depth and realism. The composition should be tight and focused, with the sunglasses centered and occupying 70% of the frame, ensuring clarity for Facebook/Instagram ads."
